name: Prajwal B
location: Bangalore - The Silicon Valley of India, where innovation meets opportunity.
about: Prajwal B is a dynamic Data Scientist, Data Analyst, and Power BI Developer with a strong passion for learning and mastering new technologies. He is known for his curiosity, problem-solving mindset, and eagerness to continuously grow in the fields of data science, machine learning, data visualization, and AI. Prajwal holds a Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) and has successfully completed professional training in Data Analysis and Machine Learning. His expertise spans: üìä Data Analytics & Visualization: Skilled in Python, Pandas, NumPy, Power BI, Excel, and SQL for delivering data-driven solutions. ü§ñ Machine Learning & AI: Hands-on experience in building intelligent models and developing personal AI chatbots. üê≥ Docker & GitHub: Efficient in containerization and project management for streamlined deployments. üåê Networking & API Integration: Basic understanding of API communication, protocols, and security concepts, currently building practical experience. üí° Problem Solver: Highly adaptable and driven to explore new tools, frameworks, and emerging technologies. Prajwal is not just a developer ‚Äî he is a lifelong learner who is always ready to embrace new challenges and contribute meaningfully to every project.

activities: Winner of university-level drama competition for 'Dhanvantri Chikitse'
Received 'Best Outgoing Student' award for exceptional contributions
Successfully developed and deployed a Blood Donation Website as a final-year project, which helped arrange blood for over 50+ people.

trainings.description: Completed 7-months of hands-on training in Python, data analytics, machine learning, and visualization. Secured the certificate while also managing a full-time job.

technical_skills: Python - Strong scripting and analytical skills
Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn - Data analysis and visualization
Excel - Dashboarding, advanced formulas, and data cleaning
Power BI - Creating interactive dashboards and connecting multiple data sources
SQL - Writing complex queries and handling relational databases
Git/GitHub - Version control and project management
Linux - Hands-on with basic commands and networking
Networking & API Communication - Good understanding of protocols and API structures
Machine Learning, NLP, Deep Learning - Building and training models
Chatbot Development - Experience in creating intelligent assistants

projects: Projects will be fetched dynamically from GitHub. If README is not available, available repo description will be provided.

experience.company: Nityo Infotech Services Private Limited (Client: IBM)
responsibilities: Worked on a project for IBM focused on web application security, API validation, chatbot development, and security testing.
Gained knowledge and exposure to web penetration testing, API testing, vulnerability analysis, and dynamic scanning of web applications and APIs.
Ran dynamic scans on web applications and analyzed the identified vulnerabilities.
Developed and fine-tuned an LLM-based security chatbot using internal datasets to enhance access to security test cases.
Worked extensively with Linux, networking, and penetration testing tools.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to streamline security workflows and improve operational efficiency.
Hands-on experience with Excel, Power BI, MySQL, Jupyter Notebook, VS Code, Google Colab, and security tools like Burp Suite, OWASP ZAP, and Insomnia.
